meanings.definition: A spherical green seed eaten as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: I like to eat peas with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: Mom cooked peas for our meal.
meanings.sent3: The peas rolled off my plate and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like bright peas in a pod.
meanings.sent5: The peas popped in my mouth with a burst of flavor.

meanings.definition: A plant of the legume family, which produces peas as its fruit.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested peas from the plant.
meanings.sent2: The peas grew well in the garden this year.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole peas from the pea plant.
meanings.sent4: The pea plant stood tall, proud of its peas.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of green peas, swaying in the breeze.
